post.title: which kuro?
post.content: after being told my sony 55hx923 has just been put back again i have given up on waiting so i am now going for all out p/q.im replacing a toshiba 55sv635 direct led backlight,had a couple of samsung 63c7000's and a panny 65vt20 last year but after problems give up so which is best 60lx6090 or krp600m/a ?
